content.body: Michael Ficarra: bakkot i've invited Nicolò to some future editor call to brainstorm ideas to make the module machinery editorially easier to understand
content.formatted_body: Michael Ficarra: bakkot i've invited Nicolò to some future editor call to brainstorm ideas to make the module machinery editorially easier to understand

content.body:
new editorial convention just dropped:
> do not use determiners or pronouns to refer to values from other steps (e.g. "that number"); instead uses aliases or repetition
